channel.title: CVE Feed for Justin Silver -- Remote Content Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Justin Silver -- Remote Content Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2023-45652|2024-08-02T20:21:16.817Z -- justin%20silver -- remote%20content%20shortcode
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Justin Silver Remote Content Shortcode allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Remote Content Shortcode: from n/a through 1.5.

item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Justin Silver Remote Content Shortcode allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects Remote Content Shortcode: from n/a through 1.5.
